alert.note: Alert for Bay (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay County through 930 PM EDT... At 823 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Skidway Lake to near Wooden Shoe Village to near Beaverton. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bentley around 845 PM EDT. Pinconning around 925 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Crump and Mount Forest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
